original_text: When the Lord has given you rest from your pain and turmoil and the hard service with which you were made to serve,
korean_text: 여호와께서 너를 슬픔과 곤고와 및 네가 수고하는 고역에서 놓으시고 안식을 주시는 날에

sentences.original_text: When the Lord has given you rest
and the hard service with which you were made to serve
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희가 섬기도록 강요받던 그 고된 노역에서
